Articles.Content:
Salutations.

I am looking for the denizens of this forum whom partake in the act of Sport Stacking.

I refuse to explain it to you, but feel free to look it up.

If you wish, you may post your YouTube channel (should it contain stacking videos) and records, as well as any other information pertaining to the subject.

Stackman1525

3-3-3: 2.05

3-6-3: 2.69

Cycle: 8.53

I began as the only stacker in my school, and likely in a 20-kilometer range, but soon I got a handful of friends stacking, and before I knew it, it\'s part of the P.E. program.

Awards:

4th 10u 3-6-3 at the 2010 Ontario Championships (I know I did badly I was nervous at my first tournament, mostly because Tyler Cole was watching me )
You mean with the cups and all? Tried it once, wasn\'t very good at it.

You mean with the cups and all? Tried it once, wasn\'t very good at it.

Lol, yes.
